A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was so in love with this franchise. The last Jedi is the last time I see a Star Wars movie in theatre. Besides the very confusing storytelling and incoherent movtivations\, all threads from previous movies were ignored or rewritten. I don't understand who's running the show over at Disney. If it didn't say Star Wars in the title\, this would not have been so well received. I'm starting to rethink the aggregator of rotten tomatoes. My heart is broken.
